segments.text: How much will our order from your factory be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be happy to get back to you with an estimate in the next few days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I can't wait that long . Can your office at least provide me with a ballpark figure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I would need an idea of how large your order would be . About how many units would you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just give me an estimated figure for an order of 100 units .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please give me a few minute to calculate ... Our asking price should be about $ 100 per unit with an order of 100 . Is that price acceptable to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your estimated is seems a little high to me , we're willing to pay $ 80 per unit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would an order of only 100 units , it'll be difficult to work within that kind of budget . Maybe if you were ordering 500 units or more units , we might be able to work something out .
segments.speaker: S2
